description: Authorities are advising against non-essential travel on or off the island because of coronavirus.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey urges self-isolation with any symptoms
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey urges self-isolation with any symptoms - BBC News
maintext: "The travel advice is due to be reviewed on a weekly basis, but I would envisage them being in place for at least a month in the first instance then review it as the situation evolves."
